General.Name: Dongyang S.Tec Co.Ltd
General.Description: Dongyang S.Tec Co.,Ltd engages in the production and sale of steel products in South Korea. The company is involved in the construction of steel structures, as well as construction of waste intermediate treatment and transportation businesses. It also offers sheets and plates for automobiles. The company was formerly known as Dongyang Steel Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Dongyang S.Tec Co.,Ltd. in 2001. Dongyang S.Tec Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Daejeon, South Korea.
